OneLineDescription: Add weapons such as Spears,Halberds, Claws, etc to perk descriptions.
LongDescription:
Goes through your modlist and sees if any Weapon has Spear, Claws, etc in their name and adds the weapon type to perk descriptions.
E.g. Battleaxes become Battleaxes, Scythes, Halberds if Scythe and Halberd weapons are found.
Which base class it belongs to is hardcoded, and I based it primarily off of Animated and Heavy Armouy.
